name: helsinki
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the capital city of Finland, situated in the southern part of the country: Increased competition is bringing down the cost of flying to Helsinki. Helsinki has, per capita, more mobile phone users and internet connections than any other city on the planet.
More examplesFewer examplesWe arrived in Helsinki the following morning.He lives in a small town 20 miles from Helsinki.The Baltic Sea Action Summit to convene in Helsinki on February 10th will attract high-level representatives from all ten Baltic Sea countries.
